Brewmaster's Cork.name: Brewmaster's Cork
Brewmaster's Cork.desc: Increases active Concoction limit by 2. Grants 2% flat DR per active concoction.

Broken Pocket Watch.name: Broken Pocket Watch
Broken Pocket Watch.desc: Increases Stamina Regen by 25 and reduces Stamina cost by 50%

Cost of Betrayal.name: Cost of Betrayal
Cost of Betrayal.desc: Reduces Max Relic Charges to 1. Increases All Damage by 20% when wearer has 1 Relic Charge. Increases incoming damage by 20% when wearer has no Relic Charges and after 30s, regain 1 Relic Charge.

Daredevil Charm.name: Daredevil Charm
Daredevil Charm.desc: Gain 7.5% to all damage dealt, 3% Movement Speed, and 5% all damage taken for each piece of unequipped armor.

Decayed Margin.name: Decayed Margin
Decayed Margin.desc: Melee hits gain 1.5% base damage dealt as Lifesteal. For each 25% missing Health, gain 1.5% additional Melee Lifesteal. When Health is full, gain 25% Melee Damage.

Difference Engine.name: Difference Engine
Difference Engine.desc: While a Shield is active, gain 20% damage and 1.5% of base dealt as Lifesteal.

Effigy Pendant.name: Effigy Pendant
Effigy Pendant.desc: While Grey Health is present, gain 15% to all damage dealt, 10% damage reduction and 1 additional hit before Grey Health is removed.

Full Moon Circlet.name: Full Moon Circlet
Full Moon Circlet.desc: Ranged damage Lifesteals 3% of base damage dealt. At full health, damage is increased by 20%.

Indignant Fetish.name: Indignant Fetish
Indignant Fetish.desc: Taking damage from enemies increases all damage dealt by 25% and reduces all incoming damage by 10%. Lasts 20s.

Kuri Kuri Charm.name: Kuri Kuri Charm
Kuri Kuri Charm.desc: For every 10% of Health missing (Max 50%), gain 10% increased Relic Use Speed and 7% chance to not consume a Relic Charge.

Leto's Amulet.name: Leto's Amulet
Leto's Amulet.desc: Reduces Encumbrance by 40% and Stamina Cost by 30%.

Matriarch's Insignia.name: Matriarch's Insignia
Matriarch's Insignia.desc: Increases Melee Damage by 35% and causes all successful Melee Attacks to restore 10 Stamina.

Navigator's Pendant.name: Navigator's Pendant
Navigator's Pendant.desc: Grants 25 Health, 25 Stamina, and -10 Armor Encumbrance.

Nightmare Spiral.name: Nightmare Spiral
Nightmare Spiral.desc: Gain 10% of base Ranged damage dealt as Lifesteal. Reduces Healing Effectiveness by 95%.

Nimue's Ribbon.name: Nimue's Ribbon
Nimue's Ribbon.desc: Increase Relic Healing Effectiveness by 50% Activating a Relic grants HASTE for 25s.

Participation Medal.name: Participation Medal
Participation Medal.desc: Increase Health by 10, Stamina by 10, Movement Speed by 10%, and Damage Reduction by 10%.

Red Doe Sigil.name: Red Doe Sigil
Red Doe Sigil.desc: Increases Relic Healing Effectiveness by 30% which doubles when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

Rusted Navigator's Pendant.name: Rusted Navigator's Pendant
Rusted Navigator's Pendant.desc: Grants 20 Health, 20 Stamina, and -15 Armor Encumbrance.

Twisted Idol.name: Twisted Idol
Twisted Idol.desc: Increases Armor Effectiveness by 30% and reduces Encumbrance by 15.

Whispering Marble.name: Whispering Marble
Whispering Marble.desc: Grants 3 stacks of BULWARK. Increases All Damage by 3% per stack of BULWARK.

Abrasive Whetstone.name: Abrasive Whetstone
Abrasive Whetstone.desc: When attacking a BLEEDING enemy, Crit Chance is increased by 15% and Crit Damage is increased by 30%.

Ankh of Power.name: Ankh of Power
Ankh of Power.desc: Grants a 15% increase to all damage. Consuming a Relic doubles the bonus for 15s.

Birthright of the Lost.name: Birthright of the Lost
Birthright of the Lost.desc: On perfect dodge, apply EXPOSED on the attacker for 10s. EXPOSED: Target receives up to 24% additional damage from all sources. Expose amount is reduced for each human ally alive.

Butcher's Fetish.name: Butcher's Fetish
Butcher's Fetish.desc: Increases Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 25% for 15s after striking enemy with a Charged Melee Attack.

Chains of Amplification.name: Chains of Amplification
Chains of Amplification.desc: Increases all damage dealt to targets suffering from a Status Effect by 20%.

Cleansing Stone.name: Cleansing Stone
Cleansing Stone.desc: Reduces Duration of Elemental Status Effects against wearer by 50%. Relic use cleanses Elemental Status effects and grants 25% of wearers Max Health to all allies within 20m when cleansed.

Core Booster.name: Core Booster
Core Booster.desc: Increases weakspot damage by 50% for 10s after killing an enemy.

Death-Soaked Idol.name: Death-Soaked Idol
Death-Soaked Idol.desc: Increases All Damage by 5% for each entity within 20m suffering from a unique Negative Status Effect. Max 5 stacks.

Death's Embrace.name: Death's Embrace
Death's Embrace.desc: Gain 20% to all damage when Health is below 100%. Gain HASTE when below 50% Health.

Detonation Trigger.name: Detonation Trigger
Detonation Trigger.desc: Increases Explosion damage by 25%. Explosions apply 405 BURNING damage over 5s.

Downward Spiral.name: Downward Spiral
Downward Spiral.desc: Increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Attack Speed by 15%. For every missing 10% of Max Health, gain 3% Ranged Damage (Max 15%) and 4% Melee Damage (Max 20%).

Effluvium Enhancer.name: Effluvium Enhancer
Effluvium Enhancer.desc: Increases ACID damage by 20% and CORROSIVE damage by 50%.

Emergency Switch.name: Emergency Switch
Emergency Switch.desc: When below 50% health, chance to consume Relic on use is reduced by 35%. Final Relic Charge is not consumed on use, but effect cannot be triggered again for 60s.

Energized Neck Coil.name: Energized Neck Coil
Energized Neck Coil.desc: Increases Status Effect damage by 25%. Applying a damaging Status Effect creates a 5m Explosion for 20% of the Status Effects full damage. Each target can be affected once every 5 seconds.

Energy Diverter.name: Energy Diverter
Energy Diverter.desc: While a SHIELD is active, gain 10 Critical Chance and 15% to all damage dealt.

Escalation Protocol.name: Escalation Protocol
Escalation Protocol.desc: Increases all damage dealt by 2.5% for 10s after killing an enemy. Stacks 10x. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.

Gift of Euphoria.name: Gift of Euphoria
Gift of Euphoria.desc: Spending 25 Stamina grants 5% Critical Chance for 7s. Max 5 stacks.

Gift of Melancholy.name: Gift of Melancholy
Gift of Melancholy.desc: Increases All Damage dealt by 25% when Stamina is at 100% for 7s.

Gift of the Unbound.name: Gift of the Unbound
Gift of the Unbound.desc: Disables negative effects of Burden Rings. Restricts Maximum Health gained by 20% per effect disabled.

Golden Ribbon.name: Golden Ribbon
Golden Ribbon.desc: Increases Mod damage by 25%. Activating a MOD grants HASTE for 15s.

Gunfire Security Lanyard.name: Gunfire Security Lanyard
Gunfire Security Lanyard.desc: Automatically reloads Magazine over time. Does not work for single shot weapons.

Gunslinger's Charm.name: Gunslinger's Charm
Gunslinger's Charm.desc: Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 20%.

Hallowed Egg.name: Hallowed Egg
Hallowed Egg.desc: Spending at least 30% of Firearms magazine to deal damage increases Melee damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 5x.

Hyperconductor.name: Hyperconductor
Hyperconductor.desc:
Gain double Skill Charges. Increases Skill Cooldowns by 50% and reduces Max Power Generation by 15%.
For Heavy Weapons, doubles Heavy Weapon Ammo instead.

Index of the Scribe.name: Index of the Scribe
Index of the Scribe.desc: Increases Mod and Skill Weakspot Damage by 35%

Inert Overcharger.name: Inert Overcharger
Inert Overcharger.desc: Standing still increases Fire Rate by 20%, Reload Speed by 15%, and reduces Recoil by 50%. Lasts 1.5s after moving.

Insulation Driver.name: Insulation Driver
Insulation Driver.desc: While BULWARK is active, gain 15% to all damage dealt and HASTE.

Jester's Bell.name: Jester's Bell
Jester's Bell.desc: Increases Mod and Skill Cast Speed by 35%. Casting a Skill or Mod increases all damage by 20% for 15s.

Kinetic Shield Exchanger.name: Kinetic Shield Exchanger
Kinetic Shield Exchanger.desc: While a SHIELD is active, gain 25% Mod damage and generate 15% additional Mod power.

Laemir Censer.name: Laemir Censer
Laemir Censer.desc: Increases Mod Duration by 50%. Increases Mod Cost by 15%.

Legacy Protocol.name: Legacy Protocol
Legacy Protocol.desc: Lowers skill cooldown by 20% and increased skill duration by 15%

Neckbone Necklace.name: Neckbone Necklace
Neckbone Necklace.desc: Reduces the Damage of Status Effects applied to wearer by 50%. Gain 25% increased Damage when suffering from a Status Effect or Blight.

Necklace of Flowing Life.name: Necklace of Flowing Life
Necklace of Flowing Life.desc: Increases Grey Health conversion by an additional 100%. When Grey Health Conversion triggers, gain 5x the amount as Mod Power.

Necklace of Supremacy.name: Necklace of Supremacy
Necklace of Supremacy.desc: After 7s of not being damaged, increases all damage dealt by 15%. Increases to 25% if Health is full.

Nightweaver's Grudge.name: Nightweaver's Grudge
Nightweaver's Grudge.desc: Gain 20% Critical Chance and HASTE when within 15m of an entity suffering from a Status Effect.

One True King Sigil.name: One True King Sigil
One True King Sigil.desc: Increases Mod damage by 20%. Enhances the effect of Faerin's Sigil and Faelin's Sigil by 50% per Sigil equipped.

One-Eyed Joker Idol.name: One-Eyed Joker Idol
One-Eyed Joker Idol.desc: Neutral Backdash creates a Magic Card lasting 1s. If Card absorbs enemy damage gain 25% Critical Chance for 5s. Neutral Backdash cost 30% additional Stamina.

Onyx Pendulum.name: Onyx Pendulum
Onyx Pendulum.desc: Firearm damage adds stacks which increase the damage of stowed firearm by 2.5% for 15s. Stacks 10x.

Range Finder.name: Range Finder
Range Finder.desc: After killing an enemy, gain 10% Ranged damage and 2m Firearm Range. Stacks 3x Lasts 10s. ranged Weakspot Hits will refresh duration.

Ravager's Mark.name: Ravager's Mark
Ravager's Mark.desc: Increases all damage dealt to BLEEDING targets by 20%. Bonus increases to 30% for targets with 50% or lower Health.

Samoflange.name: Samoflange
Samoflange.desc: Direct damage taken from enemies, and any additional damage within 2s, is reduced by 60%. Once the defensive buff expires, all incoming damage to wearer is increased by 15% for 10s.

Scavenger's Bauble.name: Scavenger's Bauble
Scavenger's Bauble.desc: Increases Scrap pickups by 50%, Automatically pick up any nearby crafting materials.

Shaed Bloom Crystal.name: Shaed Bloom Crystal
Shaed Bloom Crystal.desc: Gain a 30% damage bonus. Every 5s, the bonus switches between Physical and Elemental damage.

Shock Devide.name: Shock Devide
Shock Devide.desc: Increases SHOCK damage by 20% and OVERLOADED damage by 50%.

Silver Ribbon.name: Silver Ribbon
Silver Ribbon.desc:
Increases Skill damage by 25%.
Activating a SKILL grants HASTE for 15s.

Sinister Totem.name: Sinister Totem
Sinister Totem.desc: Applying or refreshing a Negative Status Effect to an enemy increases Status Damage by 1% for 15s. Max 50 stacks.

Soul Anchor.name: Soul Anchor
Soul Anchor.desc: Summoning increases all damage dealt by 20% for 30s.

Spirit Wisp Amulet.name: Spirit Wisp Amulet
Spirit Wisp Amulet.desc: Activating a Mod reduces current Skill Cooldowns by 3% for every 300 Mod Power spent.

Stalker's Brand.name: Stalker's Brand
Stalker's Brand.desc: Gain 10% Ranged and 15% Melee damage. Bonus double versus enemies not targeting wearer.

Talisman of the Sun.name: Talisman of the Sun
Talisman of the Sun.desc: Increases FIRE damage by 20% and BURNING damage by 50%.

Toxic Release Valve.name: Toxic Release Valve
Toxic Release Valve.desc:
Swapping Firearms releases a Toxic Cloud, which deals 148.5 ACID Damage to all enemies within 7m. and applies CORROSION. 
Can only happen once every 3s.

Vengance Idol.name: Vengance Idol
Vengance Idol.desc: Increases all damage dealt by 30% when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

Void Idol.name: Void Idol
Void Idol.desc: Increases Reload Speed by 20%. Reloads only require 50% of magazine from reserves to fully reload.

Weightless Weight.name: Weightless Weight
Weightless Weight.desc: Increases Movement Speed by 0.75% and Reduces Stamina Costs of all actions by 0.75% for each 5 point of Armor Encumbrance.
